Posts.Content: Jun 30, 2014 04:25PM Dawnlilligrace wrote: waiting on my follow up mamagram results after  2 lumpectomy and lymph node removal so scared
Posts.Title: Yearly Mammogram & 3 Month Follow Up Petitegal127 Petitegal127

Posts.Content: Jun 30, 2014 03:35PM Dawnlilligrace wrote: hi Hun I am just 50 yesterday was diagnosed last year with stage 3 hormonal based cancer I had an indentation in right breast I had biopsy and this came back as invasive. In June of last year I have had a lumpectomy and 3 nodes removed there was one infected then they did not have clearance so re opened same scars and removed more a week later they took 9 more nodes which were not infected . I had 6 months of intravenous chemo and radiotherapy lost hair eyelashes . But I kept strong it's scary but hey I'm here one year on and waiting on follow up mamagram results keep strong I have a mass of curly hair now I have 4 daughter oldest 27 youngest 6 so lots to live for keep in touch x
Posts.Title: In shock bennymuffins websister
